description: Allowlist of approved AI agents authorized to commit to this repository

agents.description: GitHub Copilot coding agent for automated code changes and PR creation
GitHub Actions bot for automated workflow operations
Dependabot for automated dependency updates and security patches

registrationProcess.description: Process for adding new agents to the allowlist
steps: 1. Create a GitHub issue using the 'Agent Registration Request' template
2. Provide agent username, GitHub App ID, and justification
3. Repository administrators review and approve the request
4. Add agent entry to this file via PR
5. Ensure PR includes: username, githubAppId, type, description, permissions, approvedBy, dateAdded, status
6. Merge PR after approval and CI checks pass

agentTypes.github-app: Official GitHub application with App ID
agentTypes.bot-user: Bot user account (legacy, prefer GitHub Apps)

statusValues.active: Agent is currently approved and operational
statusValues.revoked: Agent access has been permanently revoked
